SELECT p.PARTY_NO, p.id, p.PARTY_TITLE, ms.membership_name, p.PARTY_STATUS, p.PARTY_HEADCOUNT,p.PARTY_APPLYCOUNT,to_char(p.PARTY_POSTED_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd') as PARTY_POSTED_TIME
From(SELECT row_number() over (order by PARTY_NO desc) as rnum,PARTY_NO,ID,PARTY_TITLE,membership_no,PARTY_STATUS, PARTY_HEADCOUNT,PARTY_APPLYCOUNT,PARTY_POSTED_TIME FROM PARTY) p , MEMBERSHIP ms
WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNumber} AND #{endRowNumber} and p.membership_no = ms.membership_no
